content:
Subject: New Project Inquiry

Dear client@external-company.com,

Thank you for reaching out to us about your interest in our services. We appreciate your consideration and would be happy to discuss a potential project with you.

To move forward, we would like to schedule a call to discuss the details of your project. We have availability next week on the following dates and times:

- Monday, February 22nd: 9:00 AM - 10:00 AM
- Monday, February 22nd: 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM
- Monday, February 22nd: 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM
- Monday, February 22nd: 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM
- Monday, February 22nd: 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM
- Monday, February 22nd: 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM
- Monday, February 22nd: 5:00 PM - 5:00 PM

Please let us know which time slot works best for you, and we will send over a calendar invite to confirm the details.

We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Best regards,
Sales Team
sales@company.com
